direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods validate ISIN codes but return different types of results.
Both methods perform checks on specific parts of the ISIN code with similar control flows.
Both methods validate codes, but implemented in different external libraries.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of the ISIN validator with a country code check flag.
Environment setup is required before validating ISIN codes.
Both methods verify ISIN formats and handle similar exceptions.
